root.name: WWE SmackDown! Shut Your Mouth
root.description: Season Mode Season mode in Smackdown! Shut Your Mouth is now two years, instead of the one year of the previous game. Shut Your Mouth was the first WWE game to include the brand split. The user must compete on whichever brand they are drafted to for at least a few in game months. If your wrestler is rated below sixty, or you are using a newly created superstar, you must start out wrestling on Sunday Night Heat and work your way up to Raw or Smackdown.RosterAl SnowAlbert The Big Show Billy GunnBilly Kidman Booker T Brock Lesnar Bradshaw Bubba Ray Dudley Chris Benoit Chris JerichoChristianChuck Palumbo Reverend D-Von Diamond Dallas Page Eddie Guerrero Edge Faarooq Goldust Hardcore Holly Hollywood Hulk HoganThe HurricaneIvoryJazz Jeff Hardy Kane Kevin Nash Kurt AngleLance StormLita Mark Henry Matt HardyMavenMolly Holly Randy Orton Raven Rhyno Ric FlairRicoRikishi Rob Van Dam The RockScotty 2 Hotty Shawn MichaelsShawn StasiakSpike Dudley Stacy KeiblerStephanie McMahon Steve AustinTajiriTazz Test Torrie Wilson Triple H Trish Stratus The Undertaker Val Venis Vince McMahon William Regal X-Pac Match TypesSingleTagTornado TagSix Man TagHandicapRoyal RumbleKing of the RingHardcoreSurvivalSteel CageEliminationHell in a CellI QuitIron ManLadderLast Man StandingLumberjackSlobberknockerSpecial RefereeStreet FightSubmissionTableTLCThree Stages of Hell
